title: Why would you choose Amity University? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s why I chose Amity University- The University is great. The University upholds the highest ethical values, integrity and professionalism and an unwavering commitment to academic freedom, transparency and accountability. I am studying in Amity Gwalior and the experience has been great so far. Why one should choose Amity University - Amity imparts education in almost all areas including management, engineering, biotechnology, law, communication, insurance, nanotechnology, behavioral science, fine arts etc.Air conditioned classrooms to provide adequate comfort level for the students to pursue their studies in the desired environment.Ragging free Campus- University strictly prohibits ragging, let it be in campus or hostel. Students always live in a safe & delightful atmosphere. Several Rules and Regulations are made in order to restrict ragging in the campus.Best infrastructure (according to me), if compared to other colleges in Gwalior.Good Placements , 100% to be more accurate.Good hostel facility which ensures a safe environment for the students.

Amity University stands to be one of the best private universities in India and is the best in many states of the country. As to why one would wan tot choose Amity over other private universities, here goes :- World-class faculty100% placementsPerfect classroom scenariosplendid infrastructurestate-of-the-art laboratories and IT labsHolistic development approach towards studentsabsolutely ragging freeGigantic sports arena with all sort of equipmentfully functional media studioit has it’s own radio platformamazing atmospherecentral air-conditioningsafe and secure environmentno as such restrictionscool campus lifegreat residential facilitiesThat I hope would suffice to convince anyone.
